page.title: 11THE PRINTING TRADE
page.content: "THE PRESS" The main employer in this area is "The Press" The Anchor Press decided to enlarge in the 1960's as did The Hutchinson Group.Hutchinsons decided to centralise its book printing,binding and distribution on one site in Tiptree.The new bindery is capable of producing 380,000 books a week.New machinery installed in 1965 incorporated offset litho machines.Because of the vast number of books printed it was decided to build a new warehouse for book distribution.This is called Tiptree Book Services Limited. Tiptree is the only place in Europe where a manuscript can be received, composed,printed,bound,warehoused and distributed to the trade from one site.
